titleStmt.title: Hamilton County Court of Common Pleas

availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

org.orgName: Hamilton County Court of Common Pleas

body.p: Located in Hamilton County, Ohio. Judge(s): M.W. Oliver (1858-1867), Patrick Mallon (1858-1861), Isaac C. Collins (1860-1861), Nicholas Headington (1861-1867), and Charles C. Murdock (1861-1877). State's attorney(s): Theophilus Gaines (1859-1863) and E.B. Hutcheson (1864-1865). Clerk(s): Richard H. Stone (1858-1861), Charles E. Cist (1861-1864), and Benjamin J. Horton (1864-1867).

ab.bibl: Henry A. Ford and Kate B. Ford, History of Hamilton County, Ohio, with Illustrations and Biographical Sketches (L.A. Williams & Co., 1881), 239-240.
